title: Fennel, watercress and tomato salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons white wine vinegar', 'small handful chopped fresh tarragon', '1 dessertspoon Dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon fennel seed, ground', '5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '6 large tomatoes', '100g (4 oz) trimmed and coarsely chopped watercress', '2 bulbs fennel, trimmed and thinly sliced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
